name: B2G Consulting
overview:
B2G is an international management consultancy based in Bahrain. The main focus of the company is to support its clients in growing markets. The company has several subsidiaries in Paris, Singapore and in Melbourne. The headquarters are located in Sanabis in the Kingdom of Bahrain.

B2G expertise encompasses 4 core areas:

  1. Procurement & Sourcing: Exploring new growth opportunities through supply base in emerging markets

  2. Manufacturing: Developing lean, agile and highly cost-efficient manufacturing capabilities

  3. Supply Chain management: Optimizing the entire value chain from the suppliers to the customers

  4. Services operation: Designing optimized operations in services sector to deliver the expected level of service at the lowest cost and highest profitability

Specialties Management consulting, Procurement, Sourcing, Lean Manufacturing, Supply Chain Management, Services operation, OTC, Performance improvement, Business Process Re-engineering, Operational Due Dilligence, Change Management
